lead_paragraph: HIRSCHBERG--Irving, resident of Amagansett, NY, died suddenly on December 30th at age 88. He was predeceased by his beloved wife, Phyllis. He is survived by his two daughters, Lise and Wendy, sister Shirlee (Geri Grossman), and his grandson Miles Emanuel. He retired as an accomplished electrical engineer at Fairchild Camera. He had a major impact on the East End community. Irving was a tutor of ESL students at East Hampton High School, a friend to senior citizens through R.S.V.P. and an active Democrat. He was devoted to his tennis and golf games. Irving was a loyal and generous friend to many. Contributions may be made in his memory: Cinema Arts Centre, Huntington, Long Island or the Southern Poverty Law Center. 1/3
